title: Chapter 1768 - Announcing A Duel With Su Yi To The Entire World
body:
Chapter 1768 - Announcing A Duel With Su Yi To The Entire World

The Church of the Pure One.

A blessed land shrouded in Immortal Mist.

It was late at night, and the stars sparkled overhead. A clear breeze blew past.

Sect Leader Qi Nie was dressed in long, plain robes and seated alone beneath a tall tree. His brow was tightly furrowed, and he stared intently at the jade slip in his hands.

Months after disappearing in the Abyss of Dark Fog, Su Yi reappeared in the heart of the Buzhou Mountains to crush the Church of All Spirits!

This incident had already sent an unprecedented storm sweeping across the Immortal Realm. Countless people were in uproar, and countless immortal factions were shaken.

After all, everyone knew that the Church of All Spirits was backed by a god!

Yet now, Su Yi, a mere Immortal Lord, had crushed them overnight. Nothing like this had ever happened in the long years following the Age of Fallen Immortals.

No, it was fair to say that nothing like this had happened, period!

After all, prior to the Age of Fallen Immortals, there were no god-backed factions!

The gods forbid the return of the power of reincarnation, and indeed, they have good reasons for doing so. Su Yi is a blatant blasphemer! thought Qi Nie.

He didnâ€™t find it at all strange that Su Yi could kill Immortal...
original_title: Chapter 1768 - Announcing a Duel With Su Yi to the Entire World
